statements: SELECT * FROM vulnerable_population;
SELECT name, age FROM vulnerable_population WHERE age > 30;
SELECT id, name, location FROM vulnerable_population WHERE rights_protected = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM vulnerable_population WHERE location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT name, age, location FROM vulnerable_population ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, age, location FROM vulnerable_population WHERE age >= 18;
SELECT * FROM vulnerable_population WHERE rights_protected = TRUE;
SELECT id, name, age, rights_protected FROM vulnerable_population ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, age, location FROM vulnerable_population WHERE location LIKE '%city%';
SELECT id, name, rights_protected FROM vulnerable_population ORDER BY name ASC, rights_protected DESC;
SELECT * FROM vulnerable_population;
SELECT id, name, age FROM vulnerable_population WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT id, name, location FROM vulnerable_population ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM rights_protection WHERE protection_status='Protected' AND intervention IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, gender, location FROM vulnerable_population WHERE age >= 60 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM vulnerable_population WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, gender FROM vulnerable_population WHERE location = 'City A' AND age BETWEEN 30 AND 40;
SELECT vp.name, rp.protection_status FROM vulnerable_population vp JOIN rights_protection rp ON vp.id = rp.population_id WHERE rp.intervention LIKE '%medical%';
SELECT id, name, gender, location FROM vulnerable_population WHERE gender = 'Other' OR age >= 60 ORDER BY location, name;
SELECT vp.name, vp.age, rp.protection_status FROM vulnerable_population vp LEFT JOIN rights_protection rp ON vp.id = rp.population_id WHERE rp.protection_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM VulnerablePopulation ORDER BY person_id DESC;
SELECT name, age FROM VulnerablePopulation WHERE age > 50;
SELECT person_id, gender FROM VulnerablePopulation WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT issue_description, date_reported FROM RightsIssues ORDER BY date_reported ASC;
SELECT * FROM ProtectionStatus WHERE protection_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM VulnerablePopulation ORDER BY age DESC, name ASC;
SELECT name, gender FROM VulnerablePopulation WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT * FROM ProtectionStatus WHERE protection_level='High' AND protection_expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT vp.name,ri.issue_description FROM VulnerablePopulation vp JOIN RightsIssues ri ON vp.person_id = ri.related_population;
SELECT vp.name,ps.protection_level FROM VulnerablePopulation vp JOIN ProtectionStatus ps ON vp.person_id = ps.person_id WHERE ps.protection_expiry_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM vulnerable_populations WHERE age > 18;
SELECT id, name, address FROM vulnerable_populations WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, right_name FROM rights WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM protection WHERE protection_level >= 3 ORDER BY protection_level ASC;
SELECT id, incident_date, incident_type FROM incidents WHERE incident_type LIKE '%abuse%'
SELECT * FROM vulnerable_populations WHERE age > 60;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM vulnerable_populations WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM rights ORDER BY right_name DESC;
SELECT protection_type, protection_level, protection_description FROM protection WHERE protection_level >= 3;
SELECT id, incident_date, incident_type FROM incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Discrimination' AND incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM vulnerable_population;
SELECT name, age, location FROM vulnerable_population WHERE vulnerability_level > 5;
SELECT id, name, category FROM rights_protection ORDER BY category DESC;
SELECT * FROM protection_measures WHERE type = 'legal';
SELECT group_name, focus_area, contact_person, contact_email FROM advocacy_groups WHERE group_name LIKE 'Advocacy%';
SELECT * FROM vulnerable_population WHERE age > 60;
SELECT name, vulnerability_level FROM vulnerable_population WHERE location = 'City A';
SELECT * FROM rights_protection WHERE category = 'Healthcare' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT description FROM protection_measures WHERE type = 'Preventive Measures' LIMIT 5;
SELECT group_name, focus_area, contact_person FROM advocacy_groups WHERE contact_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
